name: GitHub
description: A platform for version control and collaboration, allowing developers to host and review code, manage projects, and build software together.

name: Stack Overflow
description: A question and answer site for programmers, offering solutions to coding problems and a community-driven knowledge base.

name: MDN Web Docs
description: Comprehensive documentation for web technologies including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, maintained by Mozilla and the web community.

name: CodePen
description: An online code editor and social development environment for front-end designers and developers to showcase and test HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code.

name: npm
description: The world's largest software registry for JavaScript packages, used by developers to share and borrow code for Node.js applications.
